sourcesContent:
<template>
    <el-form
      :model="ruleForm"
      :rules="rules"
      ref="form"
      label-width="100px"
      class="demo-ruleForm"
    >
      <el-form-item label="文章标题" prop="title">
        <el-input v-model="ruleForm.title"></el-input>
      </el-form-item>
      <el-form-item label="背景图片" prop="image">
        <input type="file" @change="handleFileChange" />
      </el-form-item>
      
      <el-form-item label="头像" prop="wImagehead">
        <input type="file" @change="handleImage" />
      </el-form-item>
      <el-form-item label="描述" prop="detail">
        <el-input v-model="ruleForm.detail"></el-input>
      </el-form-item>
  
      <el-form-item label="天数" prop="wDay">
        <el-input v-model="ruleForm.wDay"></el-input>
      </el-form-item>
      <el-form-item label="时间" prop="wTime">
        <el-input v-model="ruleForm.wTime"></el-input>
      </el-form-item>
      <el-form-item label="人均" prop="wCost">
        <el-input v-model="ruleForm.wCost"></el-input>
      </el-form-item>
      <el-form-item label="和谁" prop="wPeople">
        <el-input v-model="ruleForm.wPeople"></el-input>
      </el-form-item>
  
      <el-form-item>
        <el-button type="primary" @click="submitForm('ruleForm')">保存</el-button>
        <el-button @click="resetForm('ruleForm')">重置</el-button>
      </el-form-item>
    </el-form>
</template>
  
<script>
    import { Message } from 'element3'
  import { ref, reactive, toRefs } from "vue";
  import {reqTitle,reqUpload,reqtitle} from '@/api'
  export default {
    setup() {
      const form = ref(null);
      const ruleForm = reactive({
        ruleForm: {
          title: "",
          image: '',
          wImagehead:'',
          detail: "",
          wCost:'',
          wPeople: "",
          wTime: "",
          wDay: ""
        },
      });
      const rules = reactive({
        rules: {
          title: [{ required: true, message: "请输入文章标题", trigger: "blur" }],
          detail: [
            { required: true, message: "请输入文章描述", trigger: "blur" },
            {
              min: 1,
              max: 500,
              message: "长度在 1 到 500 个字符",
              trigger: "blur",
            },
          ],
        },
      });
      function submitForm() {
        form.value.validate(async (valid) => {
          if (valid) {
              const data = {
                        wId:1,
                        wTitle:ruleForm.ruleForm.title,
                        wImageback:ruleForm.ruleForm.image,
                        wImagehead:ruleForm.ruleForm.wImagehead,
                        wDetail:ruleForm.ruleForm.detail,
                        wCost: ruleForm.ruleForm.wCost,
                        wPeople: ruleForm.ruleForm.wPeople,
                        wTime: ruleForm.ruleForm.wTime,
                        wDay: ruleForm.ruleForm.wDay
                      }
        try {    
            // 请求成功处理逻辑
            await reqTitle(data).then(response => {
              Message({
              message: '上传成功',
              type: 'success'})
              
            })
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('上传失败:', error);
        }
  
          } else {
            console.log("error submit!!");
            return false;
          }
        });
      }
      function resetForm() {
        form.value.resetFields();
      }
  
      //背景图片
      const imageFileBack = ref(null);
      const imageFileHead = ref(null);
  
      const upload = async (imageFile,data) => {
        try {
          // 创建 FormData 对象
          const formData = new FormData();
  
          // 将图片文件添加到 FormData 对象中
          formData.append("file", imageFile.value);
          const response = await reqUpload(formData)
  
  
  
            Message({
              message: '图片上传成功',
              type: 'success'
            })
            if(data=='image'){
              ruleForm.ruleForm.image = response.data.data
            }else  if(data=='wImagehead'){
              ruleForm.ruleForm.wImagehead = response.data.data
            }
          
          
          // 上传成功后的逻辑
        } catch (error) {
            Message.error('上传失败')
            console.log("上传失败:", error);
            throw error;
          }
      };
  
  
      const handleFileChange = (event) => {
        imageFileBack.value = event.target.files[0];
        upload(imageFileBack,'image');
      };   
      
      const handleImage = (event ) => {
        imageFileHead.value = event.target.files[0];
        upload(imageFileHead,'wImagehead');
      };
  
  
      return {
        form,
        ...toRefs(ruleForm),
        ...toRefs(rules),
        submitForm,
        resetForm,
  
        imageFileBack,
        handleFileChange,
        handleImage,
        upload,
      };
    },
async mounted() {
      console.log(22);
            try {    
                   // 请求成功处理逻辑
                  const response = await reqtitle()
                  // console.log(response.data);
                  const {wtitle,wdetail,wday,wtime,wcost,wpeople} = response.data.data[0]
                  // console.log(this.ruleForm);
                  this.ruleForm.title = wtitle
                  this.ruleForm.detail = wdetail
                  this.ruleForm.wDay = wday
                  this.ruleForm.wTime = wtime
                  this.ruleForm.wCost = wcost
                  this.ruleForm.wPeople = wpeople
                  // console.log(this.ruleForm,wtitle);
  
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('Error fetching data:', error);
        }
    }
  };
  </script>
  
  <style>
  </style>
